Subject: Time Zone Issue
Description:
Hello team,

Until last week, there was no issue with the server time, but for the past week, the time data has been incorrect.

The server time is 2 hours behind the correct time. How can we fix this issue?

Thank you.
What_We_Know__c:
Customer encounter an issue with the timezone. 

The ntp server that they were using provide the time that was 1 hour behind.
Next_Steps__c:
We gathered all the necessary details and opened an ADO
We have scheduled a remote session where we fixed the issue with the steps provided by our R&D team.
Solution_Comment__c: Fixed in a session with the steps provided by our R&D team
